RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 7, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since October 7 Allowed 3 lbs. Cl aiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ONE NIGHT STAND stalked the pace engaging on the far turn drawing off down the lane being ridden out. MALIBU MARLEE set the pace being hooked on the far turn, dispatched in upper stretch would extend late to save place. ORBITING THE SKY tracked to the far turn chasing there racing four wide down the lane finishing evenly. DESIGNATE slow early was hustled on the far turn flattening out down the lane. LAUGH IT OFF gave way on the far turn. CHAMPAGNE SISTER showed early speed then folded from the half.

ENTRY.NAME: Orbiting the Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, chased far turn, 4 wide lane, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: One Night Stand
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, engaged far turn, drew off lane, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Laugh It Off
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Malibu Marlee
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, hooked far turn, no match lane, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Champagne Sister
ENTRY.COMMENT: early speed, folded

ENTRY.NAME: Designate
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, hustled far turn, flattened out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since October 7 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LA BRODY stalked the pace bidding clear on the far turn digging in near the rail down the lane holding up under stiff handling. OLIVIA'S JOY went evenly through the far turn emerging off a loose leader in upper stretch surging gamely late. TRAUMARAMA fractious in the gate rallied to upper stretch finishing fast three deep. YO YO MON raced a step slow failing to mount a bid. VALERIE FIRST was never involved. LILLY CHROME gave early retreat. OPTIMIZME unruly loading delayed the start. BALI BALIFLY set the early pace giving way to upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Bali Balifly
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: La Brody
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid clear far turn, dug in lane, held stiff handlng

ENTRY.NAME: Lilly Chrome
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave early retreat

ENTRY.NAME: Yo Yo Mon
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, never fired

ENTRY.NAME: Valerie First
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Optimizme
ENTRY.COMMENT: unruly delayed start

ENTRY.NAME: Traumarama
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, mid pack, rallied far turn, finished fast

ENTRY.NAME: Olivia's Joy
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, emerged lane, surged late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since October 7 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPENCER'S BOY LUNA stalked the pace looming into upper stretch surging late dueling up gamely inside of rival. SUCCEED pressed up on the turn dueling abreast foe in upper stretch being engaged again from the inside late battling to the wire just missing. BEYOND TALENTED set the pace being hooked on the far turn dueling from the inside in upper stretch weakening late. STRONG LIL KOKORO raced evenly through the far turn then folded abruptly in upper stretch. WICKED REVIEW wilting abruptly on the far turn was eased to the wire.

ENTRY.NAME: Beyond Talented
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, hooked far turn, dueled inside lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Spencer's Boy Luna
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, loomed to lane, drew even late, up gamely inside

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Review
ENTRY.COMMENT: wilted far turn, eased lane

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Lil Kokoro
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, folded up lane

ENTRY.NAME: Succeed
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed up turn, dueled abreast lane, battled to wire missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since October 7 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: I RUN pressed on the backside shaking clear on the far turn widening in upper stretch being ridden out. JOYRIDE slow early gave a mild rally to upper stretch coming on late between horses to save place. FIRE KING set the paced ceding on the far turn saving ground to upper stretch weakening late. GRAND SIR pressed on the backside weakening on the far turn racing evenly through the lane. IRIE ISLAND MAN was never involved. TEPPER tracked the early pace tiring on the far turn. ANGELUS DIAMOND was always outrun. VENEZUELANDREAMERS showed brief speed then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Fire King
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, ceded far turn, weakened inside

ENTRY.NAME: Joyride
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, mild rally to lane, came on inside for place

ENTRY.NAME: Tepper
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, tired far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Irie Island Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Venezuelandreamers
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief foot, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Angelus Diamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Sir
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed backside, evenly to lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: I Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed backside, cleared far turn, ridden out,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Dr. Chris Lesbines, Rod Burk, MichaelYovankin

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 8700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MAY 7, 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since October 7 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Elig ibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TAMANRASSETT stalked the pace engaging on the far turn shaking clear in upper stretch holding firm to wire. BRODYTHEOXMAN slow early lagged through the far turn rallying from mid track down the lane saving place. PEACE OF EKATI slow early circled out to upper stretch bidding belatedly near mid track. HARD N'SWEET set the pace being hooked on the far turn weakening in upper stretch. THE NEWFIE EXPRESS played no factor. SMOOTH PAPA hustled along in early pursuit would fold on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Peace of Ekati
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, circled out to lane, rallied near mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Brodytheoxman
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, rallied mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Hard n'Sweet
ENTRY.OWNER: Vickers Richard T and Pena Yendri J
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, hooked far turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Smooth Papa
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, folded far turn

ENTRY.NAME: The Newfie Express
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Tamanrassett
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, engaged far turn, shook clear lane, held safe

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 75. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING $6,500 FOR HORSES THAT HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 7 Allowed 3 lbs. Clai ming Price $6,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOCTOR PARDO pressed clear on the turn extending outside of foe in upper stretch widening under a drive. SWORD OF DAMOCLES broke sharply to the early lead, would cede on the turn staying after on the inside down the lane holding well to the wire. DEVIL'S CANYON stumbled then was jostled between horses at the break, rushed hard early chased on the turn then weakened in upper stretch. TWILIGHT YEARS raced evenly throughout lacking more. EXECUTIVE PRIZE was never involved. TOBI WAN KENOBI faded on the turn. YDOUHAVETOBESOMEAN was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Ydouhavetobesomean
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Twilight Years
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, lacked more

ENTRY.NAME: Sword of Damocles
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, overtaken turn, held well inside

ENTRY.NAME: Devil's Canyon
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled jostled break, rushed to contention, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Tobi Wan Kenobi
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Executive Prize
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Doctor Pardo
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed clear on turn, dug in lane, widened driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 7 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claim ing Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GIN N SIN slow early saved ground surging in upper stretch bidding clear from the rail. GO STELLAIRE slow early swung out to upper stretch rallying late eight wide. FLOWZANO chased the pace rallying to a short lead in upper stretch ceding late to inside then wide pressure. CHURCH KEY chased the pace racing evenly through the lane. CURIOSITY KILLS gave even pursuit weakening in upper stretch. LADY MARVEL set the pace dueling in upper stretch giving way late. GRACE CANDY gave hard pursuit through the turn folding the final eighth.

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Marvel
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, dueled lane, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Flowzano
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, dueled to lead upper stretch, out finished

ENTRY.NAME: Go Stellaire
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, swung out to lane, rallied late 8 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Gin N Sin
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, saved ground, surged from rail clear driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Grace Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, folded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Church Key
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Curiosity Kills
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 7 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CRACK THE MOON pressed the pace through the turn taking a short lead in upper stretch being hooked between horses late holding on at the wire. LONE LEADER pressed the pace dueling on the turn extending down the lane surging three deep at the wire, took a bad step past the wire and was euthanized on track. KAZTHAROS chased the pace angling inside in mid stretch surging gamely at the rail to be right there at the wire. RADCLIFFE pressed early then weakened on the turn. MARSALA MONARCH slow early played no factor. LIGHTNING JACK was never involved. BEST CHOICE BABY pressed early then tired to upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Best Choice Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, tired,

ENTRY.NAME: Marsala Monarch
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Radcliffe
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, weakened,

ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, short lane, hooked between late, held on
